title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Clippers, Earl Thomas, Brett Brown
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-Clippers, Earl Thomas, Brett Brown
description:
Colin explains why the Clippers will be fine, why Earl Thomas should be "buyer beware", and why the 76ers failure isn't HC Brett Brown's fault.


Guest: Doug Gottlieb

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
